𒌨 ≈ 𓈋 𒅆 ≈ 𓅪

evil evḪUL foul faulty

𒅆𒌨𒁴 ᵛḪUL-tim evil™ 𓈋 𓅱 𓅪 evil 𒅆𒌨𒋾 ḪUL-ti limut-ti limutti 𒅆𒌨𒌅 limut-tu 𒀉𒅆𒌨 ᵐa₂-hulu "malice"
𒊩𒅆𒌨𒌓 limᵇutu “bad” damn evil 𒊩𒅆𒎕 #damqati damn good

mean

𒊩𒅆𒌨 MUNUS.ḪUL meanness mean-ways 𒈝𒉌 lumni l'mean 𒈝𒉌 lumni evil ⇔ 𒅆𒉡 (sic)
𒈝 lumni <> lame lane 𒇷𒄷𒄭𒌓 le-mut-tú evil 𒇷𒄷𒄭𒋾 lemutti (𒂊𒄫 opus) evil-doer
𒅆𒌨𒁴 ḪUL-tim #limut 𒅆𒌨𒋾 ḪUL-ti #limut-ti 𒀀𒆳 𒅆𒌨𒁴 amat limutti «mortal motives» "evil plans" "wicked plot" nula 𒆷 ¬maat

𒀉𒄾𒅅 a2-hul-ĝal2 𒀉𒄷𒌌𒅅 a2-hu-ul-ĝal2 "mistreatment"
